author: Judith Prakash J:
casename: Luzon Hydro Corp v Transfield Philippines Inc
counsel: Wong Meng Meng SC (Wong Partnership), Anthony Soh and Carrie Gill (Colin Ng and Partners) for applicant; Giam Chin Toon SC and Hui Choon Wai (Wee Swee Teow and Co) for respondent
tags-parsed: Arbitration/Award/Recourse against award/Setting aside/Whether grounds for setting aside award established/Whether arbitral procedure in accordance with parties' agreement/Whether rules of natural justice breached in making of award/Section 24(b) International Arbitration Act (Cap 143A, 2002 Rev Ed)
